name: Neon Strike (Luanlemes) (Luanlemes)
description:
How to play (since there is no tutorial yet) :

Move: A,S,D,F or Arrows

Dash: Space or J

The Game

 Neon Strike is a RogueLike - Bullet Hell - DeckBuilder Game im developing.

Fell free to play Or Donate

This game is still in development

Even the trailer is a Works in Progress

This is a demo version, fell free to test. I must apologize because there are still lot to be developed, and fixed.

Want to help me to develop it faster? Click here

I want to know what you think

Please fell free to play upvote and comment. I will read it. And hopefully  your comment will help me to improve  the game as much as I can.

I want to know what you want, what is fun for you. thanks for the comments.

Or maybe if you are very mad with the game and wants to hurt me in someway. If thats the case I very much recomend you to throw money at me as hard as you can (this link can help you)

Help me to finish this game

If you do like this game, please help me to finish it.

 Im really looking foward to bring new content to this game.

But for that I need resourcers. To pay for artists, musics,  contracts, and for myself too.

cant wait to donate? Click Here
